name: Tomb of Doom
description:
Made for LOWREZJAM 2018, in one week's time, with ALL ORIGINAL MUSIC!

Take on the role of unique hero Schmindiana Jomes as he descends deeper and deeper into the Tomb of Doom... Battle through nine tombs filled with creepy crawlies, and defeat the dreaded Black Widow to win!

Controls: 

Arrow Keys - Move

 [Z] - Slash  (also opens doors and chests),  [X] - Dive Roll, [R] - Restart Level,  [M] - Mute All Sound
